name: Remindy
0:
”Alexa tell Remindy Man I am keeping my checkbook in the locker”
”Alexa ask Remindy Man where is my checkbook”
”Alexa tell Remindy Man I have kept my keys on the microwave”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: remindy man
des: You just need to tell Remindy Man what and where are you keeping your stuff! And Remindy will remember that and tell you the location if you ask :)
